overview:
Yishai Lerner is the co-founder and CTO of Mobly.

Prior to Mob.ly, Yishai spent 6 years developing mobile consumer products and platforms at Carrier IQ and Core Mobility, which both focused on embedded cell phone client/server applications for wireless carriers. At each company, he was the founding engineer, architecting and delivering the products as well as building the engineering teams.

Yishai has worked on consumer-focused companies including Respond.com, a lead generation service, where he led the server engineering team focused on business applications. He also developed video games at Activision Studios, where he worked on artificial intelligence algorithms, physics systems and graphics engines.

Yishai holds a B.S. in Computer Science from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology.
